clinical_study.brief_title: Validation of Questionnaires HAL and HEP
clinical_study.official_title: Spanish Validation of "Haemophilia Activities List" (HAL) and "Specific Sport Scale" (HEP-Test-Q) Questionnaires

lead_sponsor.agency: Universidad Católica San Antonio de Murcia

clinical_study.source: Universidad Católica San Antonio de Murcia

brief_summary.textblock: Spanish Validation of HAL and HEP questionnaire by double translation (English-Spanish-English), with a pilotage pediatric patients with hemophilia and adults and parents of children with hemophilia. The final validity will be obtained with a sample of 60-100 patients with hemophilia

detailed_description.textblock: Validation of the Spanish hemophilia specific questionnaires: HAL and HEP (adult version version version children and parents). To do this, there will be a double inverse translation, a pilotage of validity and clarity with a small sample of subjects and analysis of reliability and validity with more than 100 patients and parents of children with hemophilia to complete the validation.

primary_outcome.measure: Translation of the original questionnaire (English) to Spanish
primary_outcome.description: Three health experienced in the treatment of hemophilia and knowledge of English, translated into Spanish the HAL and HEP questionnaire. Two native speakers (English and Spanish), reverse-translate the original text of the HAL and HEP questionnaires and the text translated by the Spanish health

primary_outcome.measure: the translated version of the questionnaire
primary_outcome.description: 5 patients with hemophilia under 16, 5 patients with hemophilia adults , and 5 parents of children with hemophilia enrolled randomly will participate in the pilotage. The clarity of the questions in Spanish translated version and the relevance of each of the items of the questionnaires will be evaluated.

primary_outcome.measure: Sending the questionnaire to a large sample of patients for final validation
primary_outcome.description: 40 hemophilia patients under 16 years old, 60 adult patients with hemophilia and 60 parents of children with hemophilia will participate in the pilotage. The validity and reliability of the Spanish version translated from the questionnaires will be assessed.

arm_group.description: Sample of patients with haemophilia over 18 years of age that will participate in piloting of reliability and validity of the Spanish version of the HAL and HEP questionnaires
Sign hemophilia patients under 18 years of age that will participate in piloting of reliability and validity of the Spanish version of the HAL and HEP questionnaires
Sample of parents of children with hemophilia under 18 years of age that will participate in piloting of reliability and validity of the Spanish version of the HAL and HEP questionnaires

study_pop.textblock: Patients with haemophilia and parents of children with hemophilia around the country that will participate in study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with hemophilia A and B
- Parents of children with hemophilia A and B, under 18
- Patients who have previously signed the informed consent document
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with other congenital coaghulopatías (eg, Von Willebrand's disease)
- Patients with cognitive impairment, or oral or written understanding
